Recommendations: The Administration may give due attention to the following: a. repair/retrofitting of the Teatro Ilocandia and Men's Dormitory, b. refurbishment of the Physical Education rooms, offices and store rooms and dance studio at the Teatro Ilocandia, c. provide additional comfort rooms for men and women, d. provide additional cabinets to store cultural, athletic and other arts paraphernalia.
Provide additional glass cabinets where trophies, plaques and other outstanding token are kept and or displayed.
For aesthetic purposes and for the greening of the environment, the landscape within the periphery of the Teatro Ilocandia be given due consideration.
The CBEA being very active in its accreditation activities may consider the provision of a more spacious Accreditation Center furnished with cabinets, furniture and other fixtures.
For better, effective, efficient and prompt delivery of service, the University may hire a Medical Doctor, Dentist and support personnel.
The Administration may establish water treatment facility to improve water quality.
